title: Support Mains
body: Watch out. Season 5 year of the support...Ultimate Sona Skin. As a support main myself. How cool does it look?! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=widsHRZFpcs&feature=youtu.be

replies.body: To be honest sona isn't a viable. Nami does pretty much everything sona does but better
I never said Sona was viable. I just think the skin is cool. I use Sona like 10 times a season.

Sona gonna make me poor :( but oh well, that skin looks beast not a support main do play support though kinda regularly maybe 1 in 5 games. but when i play support blitz/karma/sona (i had so many gifts last year i have all the sona skins lol)

I am a support main.
I don't play Sona.
I hate playing Sona.
I don't like how her skills work.
She has a good kit and everything, but I don't like playing her.
So... this means I will have fun beating all the Sonas who are playing support just to use the cool skin.
Sona isn't one of my preferred picks. It depends on who my ADC is ofc. But I always love versing a Sona. Especially when I bring my Thresh out.
To be honest though... Sona mid is probably gonna pick up a little because no one wants to be support :P
